meanings.definition: Arrange in a systematic order or plan.
meanings.sent1: She systematizes her toys by color and size.
meanings.sent2: The librarian systematizes the books by genre for easy access.
meanings.sent3: He systematizes his morning routine to avoid forgetting important tasks.
meanings.sent4: The teacher systematizes the lesson plan to ensure all topics are covered.
meanings.sent5: The chef systematizes the ingredients to create a delicious dish.

meanings.sent1: The manager systematizes the files for quick retrieval.
meanings.sent2: She systematizes her work schedule to maximize productivity.
meanings.sent3: The team systematizes their approach to problem-solving for better results.
meanings.sent4: The coach systematizes the training sessions to improve performance.
meanings.sent5: The student systematizes the study materials for effective learning.
